overview: Emma is lonely. Nick is lonely. They are old friends. In a crappy hotel the tv is stuck on the porn channel. The decision they make will change their relationship forever. Now living interstate, Emma returns home one weekend and spends the night getting drunk with her two old friends, but as the night comes to a close old and new feelings of desire and loneliness grip the trio, ending with a bizarre goodbye, and Emma feeling more alone than ever.
title: ADULT
